import React from 'react'; import { Grid, GridItem, Input, Stack, Center, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react" import {Button, ButtonGroup} from "@chakra-ui/react" import TrendingMovies from '../Components/TrendingMovie'; export default function Homepage() { return (
{/* 1st section of page, this holds the search bar and the top menu buttons */} Trending Movies
); }
